column5: Forgot to add this clip in my post. My buddy Paul morphed into Bubbles as he landed this nice steelhead.
Beauty clip, Mike. And it does sound cold too!
Grease monkey might be my new favourite term.
Had to laugh,he sounded exactly like bubbles before I clued in to your one line intro.Too funny! nice fish!
I was wondering when you were gonna air this episode, which is why I did my best to avoid the trailer-parkian vocab...  p.-
